headline: Fresh Fruit Cobbler
name: Fresh Fruit Cobbler
description: This fresh fruit cobbler recipe features fresh peaches, pears, plums, and cherries piled into a large casserole dish and covered with a sweet batter.
recipeIngredient: 0.75 cup peeled, cored and sliced apple
0.75 cup peeled, cored and sliced pear

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 2-quart baking dish.
Arrange peaches, apple, pear, blueberries, cherries, and plums in the prepared baking dish.

Whisk sugar, milk, and egg together in a medium bowl. Sift flour, baking powder, and salt together into a separate bowl. Stir dry ingredients into wet ingredients, then stir in melted butter and vanilla. Pour batter over fruit in the baking dish to cover.
Bake in the preheated oven until bubbly and lightly browned on top, about 30 minutes. Serve warm.
